name: Marker
text:
Base class for glyphs that are simple markers with line and
fill properties, located at an (x, y) location with a specified
size.

attrs.name: angle
descs: property type: AngleSpec
The angles to rotate the markers.

attrs.name: fill_alpha
descs: property type: NumberSpec
The fill alpha values for the markers.

attrs.name: fill_color
descs: property type: ColorSpec
The fill color values for the markers.

attrs.name: line_alpha
descs: property type: NumberSpec
The line alpha values for the markers.

attrs.name: line_cap
descs: property type: Enum ( LineCap  )
The line cap values for the markers.

attrs.name: line_color
descs: property type: ColorSpec
The line color values for the markers.

attrs.name: line_dash
descs: property type: DashPattern
The line dash values for the markers.

attrs.name: line_dash_offset
descs: property type: Int
The line dash offset values for the markers.

attrs.name: line_join
descs: property type: Enum ( LineJoin  )
The line join values for the markers.

attrs.name: line_width
descs: property type: NumberSpec
The line width values for the markers.

attrs.name: size
descs: property type: ScreenDistanceSpec
The size (diameter) values for the markers in screen space units.

attrs.name: x
descs: property type: NumberSpec
The x-axis coordinates for the center of the markers.

attrs.name: y
descs: property type: NumberSpec
The y-axis coordinates for the center of the markers.
